ARABIC: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is not one of you who will not come to it. That is the final decision of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is not one among you who will not reach it. Your Lord has made this incumbent on Himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There is not one of you but shall pass by Hell. This is a decree which your Lord will fulfil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is the inevitable decree of your Lord that every one of you will be taken to hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And there is none among you who shall not pass over hell; this is an obligatory affair, binding upon your Lord. (Allah will make everyone pass over the back of hell – on a thin bridge.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There is not one of you but will pass over it (Hell); this is with your Lord, a decree which must be accomplished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there is not one of you but shall come to it; this is an unavoidable decree of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Not one of you there is, but he shall go down to it; that for thy Lord is a thing decreed, determined.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is not one of you but shall approach it. That is a fixed ordinance of thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and there is not one of you but shall pass through it: a decree from your Lord which must be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And not one of you but shall pass over it: it is for thy Lord an ordinance decreed. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is none of you but will come to it: a [matter that is a] decided certainty with your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not one of you but will pass over it: this is, with thy Lord, a Decree which must be accomplished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There is not one of you but will pass over it (Hell); this is with your Lord; a Decree which must be accomplished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is not one of you who shall not go down to it: such is a thing decreed, determined by your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is not one of you but will go down to it. This has been an unavoidable decree of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:71] There is not one of you but shall come to it, that is, [but] shall enter Hell. That is an inevitability [already] decreed by your Lord, [something which] He made inevitable and [which] He decreed; He will not waive it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is not one of you but shall approach it) there is not a single one of you, to the exclusion of prophets and messengers, save that he will enter it, i.e. hell. (That is a fixed ordinance of your Lord) it is a decree that must necessarily take place.
